scripts.build: npm run build-ssr && npm run build-index
scripts.build-ext: npm run build-jsx && npm run build-todo
scripts.build-ssr: (cd examples/ssr && node ../../utils/bundle.js index.js index.min.js && node ../../utils/ssg.js 'https://skruv.io' index.min.js index.html)
scripts.pre-release: npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint -- --fix && npm run typecheck && gzip -9kf skruv.min.js && brotli -Zkf skruv.min.js && du --apparent-size --bytes skruv.min.j* skruv.js && rm -f skruv.min.js.{gz,br}
scripts.typecheck: find . -maxdepth 1 -iname '*.d.ts' -delete && find utils examples tests -iname '*.d.ts' -delete && find . -maxdepth 1 -iname '*.d.ts.map' -delete && find utils examples tests -iname '*.d.ts.map' -delete && tsc
